page.title: 06THE RESERVOIR.
page.content: In{SOUTH KILWORTH}there is a large reservoir which is used for storing water.Fisherman buy licences to fish there, it has many rare birds nesting around its edges.Ornithologist study the birds from small huts called hides.The fear of losing these birds and wildlife made South Kilworth and surrounding villages form a petition to stop an Olympic standard clay pidgeon shoot being built, at the nearby gravel pits.It was stopped,with the service of a local Q.C representing them to a government environmental office. {FISHING} Fishing is a peaceful sport.A lot of people like fishing.There are different sorts of fishing.There is fly fishing artificial flies are used as bait.There is course fishing using worms or maggots.
